attributes.action: people aged 14 years and over should be able to hold a british driving licence
attributes.additional_details:
People of the age 14 years and over should be allowed to drive within the uk but must retake a driving test every 6 months- 12 months as it could be useful in many ways including driving to school and also it would give them a big responsibility to look after their car and make sure that they payed their insurance and tax +mot. in addition to paying these the costs would have to be reduced for people this age to £50 - £70 a year.

please if you agree plese sign this petition :)
